Trade/Device Name(s): VALIDATE® GC3 Calibration Verification / Linearity Test Kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VALIDATE® GC3 Calibration Verification / Linearity Test Kit, a quality control material for calibration verification and linearity testing in clinical labs
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro diagnostic use in the quantitative determination of linearity, calibration verification, and verification of reportable range
